original_text: For the Egyptians buried all their firstborn, which the Lord had smitten among them: upon their gods also the Lord executed judgments.
korean_text: 애굽인은 여호와께서 그들 중에 치신 그 모든 장자를 장사하는 때라 여호와께서 그들의 신들에게도 벌을 주셨더라

sentences.original_text: For the Egyptians buried all their firstborn
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람들은 자기들의 모든 장자를 장사했습니다

sentences.original_text: which the Lord had smitten among them
upon their gods also the Lord executed judgments
